mapper.select: select ma.no as managerno, c.no as cvsno, me.name, c.name as spot, c.brand, ma.storecode, ma.profit from manager ma join member me on ma.member_no = me.no join cvstore c on ma.no = c.manager_no where ma.no = #{no}
select count(*) as cnt from cvstore cvs join cvstoreproduct cvsp on cvs.no = cvsp.cvstore_no join productlist p on cvsp.productlist_no = p.no where cvsp.cvstore_no = #{cvstore_no}
